name: PTC
description: Not really since I don't like PTC software, but I'll suck it up in order to go to Hawaii

name: Distributech
description: Maybe... If we're going to push into utilities this is a must, but I think we would need a lot of work to focus our messaging on them

name: ProveIt!
description: It's a great forum for tools that have dramatic performance stats (like us), and attracts the kind of companies that are looking for 'real' performance.

name: CME Smart Manufacturing
description: Not really, because it's too Canada-focused, but I added it as an excuse to go to BC

name: NVIDIA GTC AI Conference
notes: No prospectus or CFP URL, need to email them for more info

name: Scadafest
description: No, this is VTScada focused and we're not a great fit

name: AI Engineer Europe
description: Yes. Generally, the who's who of AI attend AI Eng conf
notes: Reached out to swyx abt CFP

name: Hannover Messe
description: For europe, this is THE manufacturing show.

name: AI Dev 26 x SF
notes: Did a talk in AI Dev NYC. General talk quality at this event was rather low.

name: ACM: Building the Future of Agentic & AI Systems
PG Data Conference 2026
notes: Should submit a talk, not worth sponsoring probably

name: Automate
description: Yes, these are the serious manufacturers that we should be targeting

name: AI Engineer World's Fair
description: Yes. Generally, the who's who of AI attend AI Eng conf
notes: Reached out to swyx abt CFP

name: Ignition Community Conference
description: Yes, partnership with Ignition is match made in heaven

name: ISA Automation Summit
description: Yes, draws a very technical crowd that are dealing with the kind of problems timescaleDB solves

name: The AI Summit New York
notes: Speaker quality is very low, don't see a place to submit talk proposals

name: AI Engineer Code Summit
description: Yes. Generally, the who's who of AI attend AI Eng conf
notes: Reached out to swyx abt CFP

name: Claude Community Events
notes: 2-4 hr meetup for local Claude developer commununity

name: Adam Chan Meetups
notes: Adam Chan (formerly Weaviate) hosts meetups all the time in SF and NYC

name: Company Ventures AI Review
notes: Company Ventures is a VC firm that does quarterly events revolving around AI, we spoke at 2 of their events

name: SPE (multiple)
description: I think we should only do these if we're targeting O&G, because they don't want to see generic database info

name: HiveMQ Connack
description: Yes, HiveMQ is the TigerData of Data Brokers

name: Data Driven Oil & Gas USA 2026
description: Yes, for time series in O&G. Other companies attending are in our target list

name: AI in Oil and Gas Conference
description: Yes, for AI and specific industry focus on O&G

name: IOT Tech Expo North America
description: Yes, good fit for IoT use case; tech vendors include IBM, AWS, Cribl, Couchbase besides several security software vendors (Fortinet, Druva, etc.)
